已解决，通过设置barCategoryGap值就可以避免了，官方名称为“类目间柱形距离”，默认为类目间距的20%，在上面格式为“yyyy-mm-dd”的格式下，设置为60就可以了。
之前我也遇到过，我的做法是重新setOption之前把DIV清空一下，可以暂时解决这个问题。
监听datazoom， 返回的startvalue === 0时， 取数据setoption，就可以了

试试设置**grid.containLabel: true**
或调整**grid.left**
参考[http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#grid.containLabel](url)
`echarts.graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 0, 1, ....)` 这里前四个参数是起始点和结束点的位置，如果要实现 135度的，就是 `(0, 0, 1, 1)`。效果如图所示：

要clear一次option，然后在setoption

y轴文字太长了，你可以调整y轴text的大小来规避，或者可以考虑text换行，再不然可以缩小一下图表大小
或者参考这个：http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#yAxis.nameGap

treemap 本来没有支持在叶节点设置 borderWidth。新增了 strokeColor 和 strokeWidth 来描述这个例子里需要的边框。

（另外这个例子里的 setInterval 中的 `4000` 位置写错了，导致例子很卡。）

在坐标系层级，也可以定义 `tooltip.trigger`，`grid.tooltip.trigger = 'axis'`
line 图暂时没有支持brush。这个 `brush` action 确实是个全量更新接口，每次都要设置所有的选框。
@100pah      在grid里面定义的tooltip也是应用在series里面所有的tooltip上面啊，这和在setOption里设置是一样的效果啊；有办法对series的每一个tooltip设置它自己的trigger吗？
可以设置 formatter

@Ovilia 
thanks a lot, I supposed that. Another question: is it possible to "offset" or configure the ticks/labes aside from min, max and interval of the axes? If you look at the pic, you'll see that the first label is at value 40 and the next one at 60, so the step is 20. But the leftmost value (not shown) i.e. min is 30, not 20. I've not found a way to start ticks/labels in this way. As an examle, min:0, Interval: 20, but have the marks at 10, 30, 50, etc. instead of 20, 40, 60, etc.
The only solution I've found is to double the interval and using a formatter on the label to print a label every 2, but this leaves me with doubled ticks.
Thanks again!

Loaded qtek, version 0.4.3
Loaded echarts, version 3.7.2

更新到最新版本就可以了

The use case is to mimic a pre-printed document where several parts of a bar chart are "companded" to visually zoom into more interesting areas. Since the document will be printed it cannot be interacted.

This requires a trick before drawing the chart: it must be broken down into several stacked bars, all drawn on the same linear axis. The length of each bar must be scaled appropriately for the specific range of the main (linear) axis. It's ugly, but it works.

Your example (which I thank you for) is interesting because:

1. You supersampled the interval and used the formatter to place/hide labels, which is exactly the same trick I used. :)
1. You disabled ticks, since there is no way to "offset" them, as I suspected. I can live with it.

It would be nice to have an option to draw ticks only where a label is not null.

Thanks again!

geo的坐标系是经纬度，bmap也是，所以有些奇怪为什么只和bmap的roam冲突，geo正常
